metadata.title: CVE-2023-20593 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - high
metadata.description:
An issue in “Zen 2” CPUs, under specific microarchitectural circumstances,may allow an attacker to potentially access sensitive information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-20593` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

amd64-microcode - 3.20191218.1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-159-generic - 5.4.0-159.176
linux-image-5.4.0-159-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-159.176
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-159-generic - 5.4.0-159.176

No subscription required

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20191218.1ubuntu1.1').
linux package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-159.176').
